The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 02 December is 1,426,733 (2,534.7 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 27 November, there were 88,698 new confirmed cases (157.6 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 20 November, there were 122,666 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 28% (33,968 fewer cases).
